p:
CQ and HCQ are reported to have strong antiviral property for SARS-CoV in vitro. Similar to COVID-19, CQ interferes with glycosylation of cellular receptor ACE2 of SARS-CoV.
30 Interestingly, the inhibitory effect was noted before and after viral entry, which means CQ may offer benefit for both prophylaxis and treatment.
31, 32
